Typedef Documentation

typedef int(* metal_shm_alloc)(struct metal_shm_provider *provider, struct metal_generic_shmem *shm, size_t size)

type of shmem allocation function

Parameters
[in]providershmem provider
[in]shmshmem handle
[in]sizeshmem size
Returns
0 for success, or negative value for failure.
typedef void(* metal_shm_free)(struct metal_shm_provider *provider, struct metal_generic_shmem *shm)

type of shmem free function

Parameters
[in]providershmem provider
[in]shmshmem handle

Function Documentation

int metal_shm_provider_register ( struct metal_shm_provider *  provider)

metal shared memory provider registration

Register the metal shared memory provider to the system. After the registration, user can get the shared memory provider with its name.

Parameters
[in]providerpointer to a shared memory provider
Returns
0 for success, negative value for failure

References metal_log, METAL_LOG_INFO, metal_shm_provider::name, and metal_shm_provider::node.

void metal_shm_provider_unregister ( struct metal_shm_provider *  provider)

metal shared memory provider unregistration

Unregister the metal shared memory provider to the system.

Parameters
[in]providerpointer to a shared memory provider

References metal_shm_provider::node.

struct metal_shm_provider* metal_shmem_get_provider ( const char *  name)

get metal shared memory provider

Retrieve a previous registered shared memory provider.

Parameters
[in]namename of the shared memory provider
Returns
point to a shared memory provider for success, NULL for failure.

References metal_container_of, and metal_shm_provider::name.

Referenced by metal_shmem_open().
